ivardefs.name: accident
ivardefs.desc: Details of an accident which resulted in injuries which required the products and services listed in the claim.

ivardefs.name: billablePeriod
ivardefs.desc: The period for which charges are being submitted.

ivardefs.name: careTeam_
ivardefs.desc: The members of the team who provided the products and services.

ivardefs.name: created
ivardefs.desc: The date this resource was created.

ivardefs.name: diagnosis_
ivardefs.desc: Information about diagnoses relevant to the claim items.

ivardefs.name: enterer
ivardefs.desc: Individual who created the claim, predetermination or preauthorization.

ivardefs.name: facility
ivardefs.desc: Facility where the services were provided.

ivardefs.name: fundsReserve
ivardefs.desc: A code to indicate whether and for whom funds are to be reserved for future claims.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: A unique identifier assigned to this claim.

ivardefs.name: insurance_
ivardefs.desc: Financial instruments for reimbursement for the health care products and services specified on the claim.

ivardefs.name: insurer
ivardefs.desc: The Insurer who is target of the request.

ivardefs.name: item_
ivardefs.desc: A claim line. Either a simple  product or service or a 'group' of details which can each be a simple items or groups of sub-details.

ivardefs.name: originalPrescription
ivardefs.desc: Original prescription which has been superseded by this prescription to support the dispensing of pharmacy services, medications or products.

ivardefs.name: patient
ivardefs.desc: The party to whom the professional services and/or products have been supplied or are being considered and for whom actual or forecast reimbursement is sought.

ivardefs.name: payee
ivardefs.desc: The party to be reimbursed for cost of the products and services according to the terms of the policy.

ivardefs.name: prescription
ivardefs.desc: Prescription to support the dispensing of pharmacy, device or vision products.

ivardefs.name: priority
ivardefs.desc: The provider-required urgency of processing the request. Typical values include: stat, routine deferred.

ivardefs.name: procedure_
ivardefs.desc: Procedures performed on the patient relevant to the billing items with the claim.

ivardefs.name: provider
ivardefs.desc: The provider which is responsible for the claim, predetermination or preauthorization.

ivardefs.name: referral
ivardefs.desc: A reference to a referral resource.

ivardefs.name: related_
ivardefs.desc: Other claims which are related to this claim such as prior submissions or claims for related services or for the same event.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of the resource instance.

ivardefs.name: subType
ivardefs.desc: A finer grained suite of claim type codes which may convey additional information such as Inpatient vs Outpatient and/or a specialty service.

ivardefs.name: supportingInfo_
ivardefs.desc: Additional information codes regarding exceptions, special considerations, the condition, situation, prior or concurrent issues.

ivardefs.name: total
ivardefs.desc: The total value of the all the items in the claim.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: The category of claim, e.g. oral, pharmacy, vision, institutional, professional.

ivardefs.name: use
ivardefs.desc: A code to indicate whether the nature of the request is: to request adjudication of products and services previously rendered; or requesting authorization and adjudication for provision in the future; or requesting the non-binding adjudication of the list

properties.desc: A provider issued list of professional services and products which have been provided, or are to be provided, to a patient which is sent to an insurer for reimbursement.
